creator: Marmitek
descriptionHtml:
Smart me is a free app to (remotely) control all your Marmitek Smart me products or devices. Stay in control of your home, even when you're on holiday! With our Smart me products (e.g. Wi-Fi LED light bulbs, cameras, sensors, power plugs, doorbells) you can create a pleasant, safe and above all smart living environment in no time at all. Switch lights and devices on and off whenever you want and keep an eye on your home with our cameras, sensors and the Smart me app on your smartphone/tablet. All products are plug & play; all you need to get started is the Smart me app, a stable Wi-Fi network and our products. You can also let the Smart Me products interact with each other. If a Smart me sensor, camera or doorbell detects movement, you can have a Smart me Wi-Fi LED light bulb switch on automatically. It is also possible to combine several light bulbs in a scenario to create the right atmosphere for a movie night on the couch or a romantic dinner for two.
Plug & play | one app | voice control | expandable | no hub | create scenarios
descriptionShort: Control all the devices in your home remotely using Smart me Wi-Fi products.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Works with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa: use voice commands to control your Smart me devices and scenarios.
Multi camera view: Click on the camera icon at the top right of the main screen to view up to 4 cameras simultaneously.
Scenario logs: view your scenario log history.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Plug & play | one app | voice control | expandable | no hub | create scenarios
descriptionShort: Control all the devices in your home remotely using Smart me Wi-Fi products.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cloud Video Storage: paid service to store video recordings in the cloud.
Geofencing: activate a scenario when you arrive or leave a location.
Sunrise or sunset: set how many minutes a trigger should start earlier/later.
Invite users: send an invitation with code to add new users.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Marmitek Smart me

creator: Marmitek
descriptionHtml: Smart me is a free app to (remotely) control all your Marmitek Smart me products or devices. Stay in control of your home, even when you're on holiday! It is also possible to combine several light bulbs in a scenario to create the right atmosphere for a movie night on the couch or a romantic dinner for two.
descriptionShort: Control all the devices in your home remotely using Smart me Wi-Fi products.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added support for new Smart me Zigbee devices: Push ME (smart button), Push LE/LO (wall switches), Sense ME (motion sensor), Sense MI (door alarm sensor), Sense MA (water detector), Sense MO (temp./humidity sensor), Link ME (Zigbee gateway) and Link SE (Zigbee repeater). Smart me Zigbee buttons and sensors can be used to activate Smart me products (e.g. lamps and power plugs) or to execute scenarios.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
